features.Audio: Dolby Atmos and Object Tracking Sound

description.title: Samsung 85QN900B 85" Neo QLED 8K Smart TV
description.details: The Samsung 85QN900B 85" Neo QLED 8K Smart TV offers brilliant details shine even in daylight with Samsung's ultra-precise Quantum Mini LEDs. This smart television features Quantum Matrix Technology, which accurately regulates our proprietary new Quantum Mini LED. With precise light adjustment, you can experience fine detail in both the darkest and brightest environments. You can see all you enjoy upscaled to spectacular 8K with the AI-bases processor. Action movies, sports, and games look smooth and fluid up to 8K at 120 Hz. You can experience depth and dimension on the screen just like you do in real life thanks to the Real Depth Enhancer.

description.title: Neural Quantum Processor 8K
description.details: Samsung 85QN900B 85" Neo QLED 8K Smart TV's advanced multi-intelligent processor creates the best 8K viewing experience. Instead of one neural network to analyze visual data, Neo Quantum Processor 8K uses data generated from 20 neural networks to enhance every visual detail of your 8K content.

description.title: Real 8K Resolution and Quantum HDR 64x
description.details: The Samsung 85QN900B Smart TV allows you to feel the power of each frame with 33 million pixels of ultimate clarity and a resolution four times that of 4K. Quantum HDR 64x establishes a new standard for extraordinary detail and brightness. Enjoy vibrant, accurate color as well as deeper contrast and crisp detail. HDR10dynamic +'s tone mapping shifts color and contrast scene by scene, allowing you to appreciate even the most subtle nuances.

description.title: Dolby Atmos and Object Tracking Sound Pro
description.details: Samsung 85QN900B's top channel speakers deliver a next-level Dolby Atmos experience that will immerse you inside the action with multi-dimensional sound. Immerse you deeper into your listening experience on all corners of the TV, including the center, without missing any audio clue.

description.title: Exceptional motion enhancements in 4K 120Hz
description.details: The Samsung 85QN900B 85" Neo QLED 8K Smart TV features Motion Xcelerator Turbo+. Conquer every enemy, even at soaring speeds. With exceptional motion enhancements up to 4K 120Hz, you can enjoy gameplay with ultra-smooth action without lag and motion blur.

description.title: FreeSync Premium Pro
description.details: Samsung 85QN900B comes with Certified AMD FreeSync Premium Pro core technology, you'll experience reduced stutter and screen tearing as well as a superior combination of smooth gaming at peak performance, exceptional high dynamic range visuals and low latency for true game-winning performance.

description.title: Sony Bravia XR 77A80J 77"4K Ultra HD Android Smart OLED Alexa Compatible Google TV
description.details: The Sony Bravia XR 77A80J 77 Inch TV comes with Cognitive Processor XR Processing Technology. It understands how humans see and hear to deliver intense contrast with pure blacks, high peak brightness, and natural colors. It also features XR TRILUMINOS PRO and XR OLED CONTRAST. It helps you feel the beauty of OLED contrast with pure blacks and lifelike brightness. It has a 76.5" OLED display and incorporates Sony's XR Motion Clarity technology to digitally enhance fast-moving images to reduce blur. HDR10, HLG, and Dolby Vision compatibility offer a wide color gamut and enhanced brightness and contrast to provide vibrant, lifelike images for compatible content.

description.title: Acoustic Auto Calibration
description.details: The Sony Bravia XR 77A80J TV detects your position and optimizes sound so you'll enjoy the same sound quality as if you're sitting right in front of the TV. Sound can change depending on your room environment. Curtains, for example, absorb sound while objects in front of the TV can disturb the passage of sound, compromising the quality of what you hear. This TV detects objects and reproduces sound that's enhanced and optimized to your room.

description.title: Voice Search and Smart Remote
description.details: Sony Bravia XR 77A80J Smart Television features Smart voice control. You can find your favorite content faster than ever using the power of your voice. With Voice Search, there's no more complicated navigation or tiresome typing you just have to ask. All your connected devices can be controlled with our smart commander. One button access to video-on-demand services brings shows and movies into your room in seconds.

description.title: Google TV
description.details:
The Sony Bravia XR 77A80J lets you browse 700,000+ movies and TV episodes from across your streaming services, all in one place and organized into topics and genres based on what interests you. Searching is easy - just ask Google. Press the Google Assistant button on your remote and try saying “find action movies” to search across your favorite apps.

The Sony Bravia XR 77A80J Android Smart Google Tv comes with no parts warranty.

product_name: LG A2 77-inch SELF-LIT OLED 4K UHD Smart Television

features.Resolution: 4K Ultra HD (3,840 x 2,160) SELF-LIT OLED Display

description.title: LG A2 77-inch SELF-LIT OLED 4K UHD Smart Television
description.details: The LG A2 77-inch SELF-LIT OLED 4K UHD Smart Television offers an exceptional viewing experience with its self-lit OLED technology, delivering perfect darkness and infinite contrast. The α7 Gen 5 AI Processor enhances the depth of the image for lifelike quality, while Dynamic Tone Mapping optimizes HDR content for stunning visuals. The television provides immersive surround sound with virtual 5.1.2 channel audio, creating a captivating audio experience. With ThinQ AI and webOS, you can enjoy personalized recommendations and easily access your favorite content. The sleek and slim design of the TV adds a touch of elegance to any space, and Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos ensure a true cinema experience. You can access a wide range of streaming apps, including Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Apple TV+, for endless entertainment options. The TV also offers powerful gameplay features, including a low response time and a dedicated Game Dashboard for optimal gaming settings.

description.title: α7 Gen 5 AI Processor
description.details: LG A2 77-inch OLED 4K Smart TV comes with the latest α7 Gen 5 AI Processor, engineered exclusively for LG OLED to automatically adjust your settings to improve picture and sound qualities based on whatever you’re watching. Dynamic Tone Mapping uses the α7 Gen 5 AI Processor to detect what's in the frame and apply the optimal tone curve. The result is a natural HDR, deep contrast, and intricate detail. The α7 Gen 5 AI Processor up-mixes 2-channel audio into virtual 5.1.2 channel sound. Feel the action and chaos around you as you venture deeper into your game world.

description.title: OLED Picture Quality
description.details: The LG A2 77-inch OLED 4K Smart TV features self-lit OLED pixels that deliver exceptional contrast and deep black levels, while showcasing over a billion colors for a stunning visual experience across all content.
